meta.title: A Tsunami of Disciples, Leaders, and Christ Communities
meta.description: A simple explanation of how the Lord is raising a Spirit-led tsunami of disciples, leaders, and Christ communities, and how you might walk with Him in it.
brand.name: A Tsunami of Disciples
brand.tagline: From His presence to the nations
hero.tag.primary: A quiet, global move of God
hero.tag.secondary: Loving Him → Obeying Him → Generations of disciples
